titles.title: Metadata for Interview Questions, Observation Scheme and Materials Analysis

descriptions.description:
This folder contains three files that are all related to a mixed-methods study on current reading comprehension instruction in the Netherlands:
> Interview Questions > Observation Scheme > Materials Analysis
> Interview Questions This file contains interview questions (Dutch) on the curricular content of textbooks for reading comprehension instruction, as well as a shortened English translation. These interview questions were used for semi-structured teacher interviews in the context of a mixed-methods study on the content of teaching materials that are used for reading comprehension instruction in Dutch primary schools. The purpose of these interview questions was to gain insight into teachers' use and evaluation of their textbooks for reading comprehension instruction.
> Observation scheme This file contains the Dutch observation scheme that was used for lesson observations during reading comprehension lessons in various Dutch primary schools. The file also contains a shortened, translated overview of the observation scheme (English). The purpose of the observation scheme was to gain insight into typical classroom practice during reading comprehension lessons.
> Materials analysis This file contains the guidelines for an analysis of textbooks and other teaching materials that are used to teach reading comprehension in Dutch primary schools, as well as a shortened English overview.
